items.title: Pakistan militants attack train and take passengers hostage
items.description: Police say at least three people were injured in the attack and it is unclear how many people are being held hostage.

items.title: Portugal elections loom as MPs hold confidence vote
items.description: PM Lu√≠s Montenegro is set to lose a vote of confidence, pitching his country into a third election in as many years.

items.title: Maradona medical team on trial for football icon's death
items.description: Prosecutors say the Argentine legend's death could have been avoided and accuse hospital staff of negligence.

items.title: Greenland's election: Why does it matter and how does it work?
items.description: Five of the six parties favour Greenland's independence from Denmark, differing only on how quickly that should come about.

items.title: Philippines ex-leader Duterte on plane to the Hague after arrest
items.description: The ICC accuses him of "crimes against humanity" in a drugs crackdown that left thousands dead.
